ComicInfo.Title: Cry Werewolf; The Men in the Morgue; Insane; The Smasher; Half-Man
ComicInfo.Summary:
Cry Werewolf: A soldier in the Hungarian army comes to suspect that one of his comrades is a werewolf.
The Men in the Morgue: Two killers attempt to hide in the morgue, but the attendant locks them in the freezer.
Insane: When Phil Jones is accused of being the Vampire Killer, he is convicted despite his claim of innocence. He is saved from the electric chair at the last minute when the real killer is found, but the ordeal has driven him mad, and once freed, he starts killing people as a vampire would.
The Smasher: Hank Girard loves operating the wrecking ball on the construction site where he works, and he eventually uses it to kill the foreman who always criticizes him.
Half-Man: A scientist creates an android from parts of dead bodies, but he leaves one part out, which leads to terrible consequences.
